original_text: And Moses sent to spy out Jaazer, and they took the villages thereof, and drove out the Amorites that were there.
korean_text: 모세가 또 사람을 보내어 야셀을 정탐하게 하고 그 촌락들을 빼앗고 그 곳에 있던 아모리인을 몰아 내었더라

sentences.original_text: And Moses sent to spy out Jaazer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세가 야셀을 정탐하려고 사람을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: and they took the villages thereof
and drove out the Amorites that were there
